email: Must be a valid email address
file: Value is not a valid file
file_size: File size must be less than %d bytes
image_width_min: Image width must be greater than %dpx
image_width_max: Image width must be less than %dpx
image_height_min: Image height must be greater than %dpx
image_height_max: Image height must be less than %dpx
ipv4: Must be a valid IP address
length_min_max: Must be greater than %d and less than %d characters
number_min_max: Must be greater than %d and less than %d
